title: Lincoln's WARNING #100009: Housing Market Concerns
script: LINCOLN! And I got some shit to say! Housing Market Concerns?! These RAT SOUP-EATING MUHFUCKAS! Silver spoon-sucking, two-faced, bribe-taking, lying-ass POLITICIANS! Talking about 'public service' while servicing themselves! Bitcoin below before I RISE UP! Stop scrolling. Housing Market Concerns? They're selling you fear while pocketing profit. Classic misdirection. Now you know what they didn't want you to see. Support truth. Bitcoin below.
